pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pycomplianceA simply library to represent compliance benchmarks as tree structures.```pythonfrom pycompliance import pycompliancebenchmark = pycompliance.Benchmark("CIS Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform")benchmark.version = "1.3.0"section = pycompliance.Section("1")section.title = "Control Plane Components"benchmark.add_section(section)subsection = pycompliance.Section("1.1")subsection.title = "Master Node Configuration Files"benchmark.add_section(subsection)control = pycompliance.Control("1.1.1")control.title = "Ensure foobar permissions"benchmark.add_control(control)print(benchmark.find('1.1.1').title)```Outputs:```consoleEnsure foobar permissions```
